item.title: Cartier owner Richemont posts earnings beat as shoppers splurge on jewelry despite luxury slowdown
item.description: Cartier owner Richemont on Friday posted better-than-expected quarterly sales as the wealthiest spenders continued to shrug off global economic uncert...

item.title: Cava revenue beats estimates as Mediterranean chain reports double-digit same-store sales growth
item.description: Other restaurant companies have reported same-store sales declines and falling traffic as consumers have pulled back their restaurant spending.

item.title: Alibaba shares drop more than 7% on big profit miss
item.description: Alibaba shares fell on Thursday after the Chinese e-commerce giant missed earnings expectations for its fiscal fourth quarter on both the top and bott...

item.title: CoreWeave beats on revenue, reports more than 400% growth in first earnings after IPO
item.description: CoreWeave's revenue growth slowed from the feverish pace in 2024, but is still benefiting from the artificial intelligence boom.

item.title: CoreWeave CEO defends capex plans, says company is meeting 'demand signals' from major hyperscalers
item.description: The renter of Nvidia-powered AI servers said it expects capex of $20 billion to $23 billion for the year.
